sources.name: Data
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  Data

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared Data = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://franmerstorecanada.blob.core.windows.net/adf-demo/ReferenceDemo/0Data/DS20200720200710000000.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ";", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = Data,
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Source, {{"Nombre", type number}}),
  #"Replaced value" = Table.ReplaceValue(#"Changed column type", " ", "", Replacer.ReplaceText, {"Montant"}),
  #"Changed column type 1" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Replaced value", {{"Montant", type number}})
in
  #"Changed column type 1";
